00028 template <typename T> struct UHashCodeFunctor;
00029 
00035 template <typename T> struct UEqualsFunctor { bool operator()(const T& a, const T& b) const { return (a == b); } };
00036 
00041 template <typename K, typename I,
00042           typename H = UHashCodeFunctor<K>, typename E = UEqualsFunctor<K> > class UGenericHashMap {
00043 public:
00044    // Check for memory error
00045    U_MEMORY_TEST
00046 
00047    // Allocator e Deallocator
00048    U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00049    U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00050 
00051 protected:
00052    struct UGenericHashMapNode // structure for keeping a linked-list of elements
00053       {
00054       K key;
00055       I item;
00056       uint32_t hash;
00057       UGenericHashMapNode* next;
00058 
00059       UGenericHashMapNode(const K& _key, const I& _item, UGenericHashMapNode* _next, uint32_t _hash)
00060          {
00061          key  = _key;
00062          item = _item;
00063          hash = _hash;
00064          next = _next;
00065          }
00066       };
00067 
00068    E equals;
00069    H hashcode;
00070    UGenericHashMapNode* node;
00071    UGenericHashMapNode** table;
00072    uint32_t _length, _capacity, index, hash;
00073 
00074    // Find a elem in the array with <key>
00075 
00076    template <typename X>
00077    void lookup(const X& key)
00078       {
00079       U_TRACE(0, "UGenericHashMap<K,I>::lookup(%p)", &key)
00080 
00081       U_CHECK_MEMORY
00082 
00083       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_MAJOR(_capacity, 0)
00084 
00085       hash  = hashcode(key);
00086       index = hash & (_capacity - 1); // hash % _capacity;
00087 
00088       U_INTERNAL_DUMP("index = %u", index)
00089 
00090       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_RANGE(0,index,_capacity-1)
00091 
00092       UGenericHashMapNode* prev = 0;
00093 
00094       for (node = table[index]; node; node = node->next)
00095          {
00096          if (node->key == key)
00097             {
00098             // lista self-organizing (move-to-front), antepongo
00099             // l'elemento trovato all'inizio della lista delle collisioni...
00100 
00101             if (prev)
00102                {
00103                prev->next   = node->next;
00104                node->next   = table[index];
00105                table[index] = node;
00106                }
00107 
00108             U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(node, table[index])
00109 
00110             break;
00111             }
00112 
00113          prev = node;
00114          }
00115 
00116       U_INTERNAL_DUMP("node = %p", node)
00117       }
00118 
00119 public:
00120    // Costruttori e distruttore
00121 
00122    UGenericHashMap()
00123       {
00124       U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UGenericHashMap, "", 0)
00125 
00126       _length = _capacity = 0;
00127       }
00128 
00129    ~UGenericHashMap()
00130       {
00131       U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UGenericHashMap)
00132       }
00133 
00134    // allocate and deallocate methods
00135 
00136    void allocate(uint32_t n = 64)
00137       {
00138       U_TRACE(0, "UGenericHashMap<K,I>::allocate(%u)", n)
00139 
00140       U_CHECK_MEMORY
00141 
00142       table     = U_MALLOC_VECTOR(n, UGenericHashMapNode);
00143       _capacity = n;
00144 
00145       (void) memset(table, '\0', n * sizeof(UGenericHashMapNode*));
00146       }
00147 
00148    void deallocate()
00149       {
00150       U_TRACE(0, "UGenericHashMap<K,I>::deallocate()")
00151 
00152       U_CHECK_MEMORY
00153 
00154       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_MAJOR(_capacity, 0)
00155 
00156       U_FREE_VECTOR(table, _capacity, UGenericHashMapNode);
00157 
00158       _capacity = 0;
00159       }
00160 
00161    // Size and Capacity
00162 
00163    uint32_t size() const
00164       {
00165       U_TRACE(0, "UGenericHashMap<K,I>::size()")
00166 
00167       U_RETURN(_length);
00168       }
00169 
00170    uint32_t capacity() const
00171       {
00172       U_TRACE(0, "UGenericHashMap<K,I>::capacity()")
00173 
00174       U_RETURN(_capacity);
00175       }
00176 
00177    bool empty() const
00178       {
00179       U_TRACE(0, "UGenericHashMap<K,I>::empty()")
00180 
00181       U_RETURN(_length == 0);
00182       }

00184    // Ricerche
00185 
00186    template <typename X>
00187    bool find(const X& key)
00188       {
00189       U_TRACE(0, "UGenericHashMap<K,I>::find(%p)", &key)
00190 
00191       lookup(key);
00192 
00193       U_RETURN(node != NULL);
00194       }
00195 
00196    // Set/get methods
00197 
00198    I& elem() { return node->item; }
00199 
00200    template <typename X>
00201    I& operator[](const X& key)
00202       {
00203       U_TRACE(0, "UGenericHashMap<K,I>::operator[](%p)", &key)
00204 
00205       lookup(key);
00206 
00207       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(node)
00208 
00209       return node->item;
00210       }
00211 
00212    // Explicit method to access the key portion of the current element. The key cannot be modified
00213 
00214    const K& key() const { return node->key; }
00215 
00216    // dopo avere chiamato find() (non effettuano il lookup)
00217 
00218    void eraseAfterFind()
00219       {
00220       U_TRACE(0, "UGenericHashMap<K,I>::eraseAfterFind()")
00221 
00222       // presuppone l'elemento da cancellare all'inizio della lista
00223       // delle collisioni - lista self-organizing (move-to-front)...
00224 
00225       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(node, table[index])
00226 
00227       table[index] = node->next;
00228 
00229       delete node;
00230 
00231       --_length;
00232 
00233       U_INTERNAL_DUMP("_length = %u", _length)
00234       }
00235 
00236    template <typename X, typename Y>
00237    void insertAfterFind(const X& key, const Y& item)
00238       {
00239       U_TRACE(0, "UGenericHashMap<K,I>::insertAfterFind(%p,%p)", &key, &item)
00240 
00241       U_CHECK_MEMORY
00242 
00243       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(node, 0)
00244 
00245       // antepongo l'elemento all'inizio della lista delle collisioni
00246 
00247       node = table[index] = U_NEW(UGenericHashMapNode(key, item, table[index], hash));
00248 
00249       ++_length;
00250 
00251       U_INTERNAL_DUMP("_length = %u", _length)
00252       }
00253 
00254    template <typename Y>
00255    void replaceAfterFind(const Y& item)
00256       {
00257       U_TRACE(0, "UGenericHashMap<K,I>::replaceAfterFind(%p)", &item)
00258 
00259       // presuppone l'elemento da sostituire all'inizio della lista
00260       // delle collisioni - lista self-organizing (move-to-front)...
00261 
00262       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(node, table[index])
00263 
00264       node->item = item;
00265       }
00266 
00267    template <typename X, typename Y>
00268    void insert(const X& key, const Y& item)
00269       {
00270       U_TRACE(0, "UGenericHashMap<K,I>::insert(%p,%p)", &key, &item)
00271 
00272       lookup(key);
00273 
00274       insertAfterFind(key, item);
00275       }
00276 
00277    template <typename X>
00278    bool erase(const X& key)
00279       {
00280       U_TRACE(0, "UGenericHashMap<K,I>::erase(%p)", &key)
00281 
00282       lookup(key);
00283 
00284       if (node)
00285          {
00286          eraseAfterFind();
00287 
00288          U_RETURN(true);
00289          }
00290 
00291       U_RETURN(false);
00292       }
00293 
00294    template <typename X, typename Y>
00295    void update(const X& key, const Y& item)
00296       {
00297       U_TRACE(0, "UGenericHashMap<K,I>::update(%p,%p)", &key, &item)
00298 
00299       lookup(key);
00300 
00301       if (node) replaceAfterFind(item);
00302       else       insertAfterFind(key, item);
00303       }
00304 
00305    // Make room for a total of n element
00306 
00307    void reserve(uint32_t n)
00308       {
00309       U_TRACE(0, "UGenericHashMap<K,I>::reserve(%u)", n)
00310 
00311       U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(_capacity, 0)
00312 
00313       UGenericHashMapNode** old_table    = table;
00314       uint32_t       old_capacity = _capacity;
00315 
00316       allocate(n);
00317 
00318       // inserisco i vecchi elementi
00319 
00320       UGenericHashMapNode* next;
00321 
00322       for (uint32_t i = 0; i < old_capacity; ++i)
00323          {
00324          if (old_table[i])
00325             {
00326             node = old_table[i];
00327 
00328             do {
00329                next  = node->next;
00330                index = node->hash & (_capacity - 1); // node->hash % _capacity;
00331 
00332                U_INTERNAL_DUMP("i = %u index = %u", i, index)
00333 
00334                // antepongo l'elemento all'inizio della lista delle collisioni
00335 
00336                node->next   = table[index];
00337                table[index] = node;
00338                }
00339             while ((node = next));
00340             }
00341          }
00342 
00343       U_FREE_VECTOR(old_table, old_capacity, UGenericHashMapNode);
00344       }
00345 
00346    // Cancellazione tabella
00347 
00348    void clear()
00349       {
00350       U_TRACE(0, "UGenericHashMap<K,I>::clear()")
00351 
00352       U_INTERNAL_DUMP("_length = %u", _length)
00353 
00354 #  ifdef DEBUG
00355       int sum = 0, max = 0, min = 1024, width;
00356 #  endif
00357 
00358       UGenericHashMapNode* next;
00359 
00360       for (index = 0; index < _capacity; ++index)
00361          {
00362          if (table[index])
00363             {
00364             node = table[index];
00365 
00366 #        ifdef DEBUG
00367             ++sum;
00368             width = -1;
00369 #        endif
00370 
00371             do {
00372 #           ifdef DEBUG
00373                ++width;
00374 #           endif
00375 
00376                next = node->next;
00377 
00378                delete node;
00379                }
00380             while ((node = next));
00381 
00382 #        ifdef DEBUG
00383             if (max < width) max = width;
00384             if (min > width) min = width;
00385 #        endif
00386 
00387             table[index] = 0;
00388             }
00389          }
00390 
00391       U_INTERNAL_DUMP("collision(min,max) = (%d,%d) - distribution = %f", min, max, (double)_length / (double)sum)
00392 
00393       _length = 0;
00394       }
00395 
00396    // Call function for all entry
00397 
00398    bool first()
00399       {
00400       U_TRACE(0, "UGenericHashMap<K,I>::first()")
00401 
00402       U_INTERNAL_DUMP("_length = %u", _length)
00403 
00404       for (index = 0; index < _capacity; ++index)
00405          {
00406          if (table[index])
00407             {
00408             node = table[index];
00409 
00410             U_RETURN(true);
00411             }
00412          }
00413 
00414       U_RETURN(false);
00415       }
00416 
00417    bool next()
00418       {
00419       U_TRACE(0, "UGenericHashMap<K,I>::next()")
00420 
00421       U_INTERNAL_DUMP("index = %u node = %p next = %p", index, node, node->next)
00422 
00423       if ((node = node->next))
00424          {
00425          U_RETURN(true);
00426          }
00427 
00428       for (++index; index < _capacity; ++index)
00429          {
00430          if (table[index])
00431             {
00432             node = table[index];
00433 
00434             U_RETURN(true);
00435             }
00436          }
00437 
00438       U_RETURN(false);
00439       }

00441 #ifdef DEBUG
00442    const char* dump(bool reset) const
00443       {
00444       *UObjectIO::os << "hash      " << hash         << '\n'
00445                      << "node      " << (void*)node  << '\n'
00446                      << "index     " << index        << '\n'
00447                      << "table     " << (void*)table << '\n'
00448                      << "_length   " << _length      << "\n"
00449                      << "_capacity " << _capacity;
00450 
00451       if (reset)
00452          {
00453          UObjectIO::output();
00454 
00455          return UObjectIO::buffer_output;
00456          }
00457 
00458       return 0;
00459       }
00460 #endif
